front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Diff Event Package

abstract.t: This document describes an "xcap-diff" SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) event package for the SIP Event Notification Framework, which clients can use to receive notifications of changes to Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) resources. The initial synchronization information exchange and document updates are based on the XCAP Diff format.
